name: DentalEZ
0:
”Alexa, open Dental Ease.”
”Alexa, ask Dental Ease to get the status of Compressor 1.”
”Alexa, ask Dental Ease to turn on Compressor 1.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dental ease
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To use this skill, you must have an Ramvac Dental Compressor or Vacuum installed and the equipment must be able to obtain a cellular signal which can be found on the equipment control LCD screen. Additionally, you must have an active Aeras Intel account.

To activate the skill, you must link it to your Aeras Intel account by signing into the skill using your Aeras Intel account credentials.

After linking the skill to your account, you can use the Alexa app or Alexa devices to obtain status updates for your equipment and turn your equipment on or off.
